actions.description: The diviner makes three Arcane Burst attacks.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: 7 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 120 ft., one target. Hit: 20 (3d10 + 4) radiant damage.
actions.name: Arcane Burst

actions.description: The diviner magically creates a burst of illumination in a 10-foot-radius sphere centered on a point within 120 feet of it. Each creature in that area must make a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 45 (10d8) psychic damage and is stunned until the end of the diviner's next turn. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage and isn't stunned.
actions.name: Overwhelming Revelation (Recharge 5-6)

actions.description:
The diviner casts one of the following spells, using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 15):
At will: mage hand, message, prestidigitation

2/day each: arcane eye, detect magic, detect thoughts, fly, lightning bolt, locate object, mage armor, Rary's telepathic bond

1/day each: true seeing
actions.name: Spellcasting
